verify.code: () => { const classes = window.AnimalClasses || {}; const missing = []; if (!classes['HelicopterPlant']) missing.push('HelicopterPlant'); if (!classes['ShyPlant']) missing.push('ShyPlant'); if (!classes['CrystalPlant']) missing.push('CrystalPlant'); if (missing.length > 0) return { success: false, message: 'Missing classes: ' + missing.join(', ') }; return { success: true, message: 'All plant classes registered' }; }
